subject: Automobile Racing
organizations: National Assn of Stock Car Auto Racing
lead_paragraph: Hendrick Motorsports is still the 800-horsepower gorilla in the Nascar garage area. But it has slipped in recent weeks, and the rest of the field is starting to catch up.
snippet: Hendrick Motorsports is still the 800-horsepower gorilla in the Nascar garage area. But it has slipped in recent weeks, and the rest of the field is starting to catch up.
